programme.title: Decline in US personal savings
programme.short_synopsis: The differing opinions of economists on the drop in personal savings to below zero.
programme.medium_synopsis: American personal saving rates drop below zero and Alistair Cooke considers the economists who see this as good news, those who see it as bad and a culture that encourages credit.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Decline in US personal savings

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
